text: Hey Swathik! Are you by any chance in the beta for event triggers? If not, you can DM me your Hub ID and I can add you. Then you can test out the property change event to use for re-enrollment to see if that solves your use case <@U04EGUY0U06>

Marketing > emails > create email > automated email. 

If you already created a regular email, go to it (marketing > emails > click the email > edit > top right (action or edit?) > convert to Automated email. 

Then you will see it populate in the drop-down of the image you have above.

Hi Sierra, Thanks for the response.
I have shared details in DM.
<@U04M8KXHTNG>
